aboutp1: — a digital platform for improving internal communication and strengthening team spirit. We offer convenient tools for team analytics, training sessions, and exciting VR tours.
aboutp2: We pay special attention to anonymous psychological support — a safe space where every employee can get help without fear or bias.
aboutp3: helps create a trustworthy and efficient work environment for your entire team.
card1Text: Our quests are designed with the interests and experience of adult participants in mind and include immersive elements — engaging multiple senses: sight, hearing, touch, and more. They combine entertainment with meaningful professional or moral messages aimed at developing teamwork, effective communication, and problem-solving. Participants gain hands-on experience in conditions as close as possible to real work situations, strengthening trust and cohesion.
card2Text: We analyze the current state of the internal environment through individual meetings, specialized surveys, and tools. A professional psychologist reviews the data and provides recommendations for suitable training and events. The program is reviewed monthly with a reassessment of results and adjustments if necessary.
card3Text: We tailor team-building events based on your team’s specific needs and goals. Each activity is developed considering the company’s objectives — whether it's improving communication, building trust, or increasing cohesion. All sessions are led by professional trainers who create a collaborative atmosphere and foster the development of key skills.
card4Text: Based on our clients’ experience, many employees fear approaching HR with personal issues due to lack of trust and fear of being identified. That's why we offer anonymous sessions with a professional psychologist who does not know the identity of the client. This helps resolve individual and collective communication issues effectively and offers an objective view of team dynamics.
card5Text: VR tours allow your team to explore different parts of the world without leaving the office. This format helps employees relax and change scenery, reducing stress. The immersion creates a presence effect, restoring emotional balance and boosting team spirit. Outdoor trips around Moldova promote cultural understanding and team bonding, creating a healthy work environment.
data3p1: - Advanced engagement analytics + monthly strategy development.
data3p3: - 2 team-building events + VR and field trip.
